info.name: TeamForge Baselines REST API Documentation
info.description:
TeamForge Baseline APIs are used to perform all baseline related activities in TeamForge.

Read [how to authenticate](https://forge.collab.net/apidoc/#auth) to know more about authentication and access tokens.

```
Since TeamForge 20.1
```

Deletes a baseline that is in either Open or Rejected meta status. 

Response Codes
* 500 - Internal Server Error
* 400 - Invalid Baseline Id
* 200 - Deleted Successfully
* 403 - Permission Denied
